changeSet.sql: alter table item_data DISABLE TRIGGER item_data_update; alter table item_data DISABLE TRIGGER repeating_data_insert;

changeSet.author: kkrumlian
changeSet.comment: Change date format for dataype date,pdate (MM/dd/YYYY) to ISO-8601
changeSet.sql: update item_data set value= substring(item_data.value from 7 for 4) || '-' || substring(item_data.value from 1 for 2) || '-' || substring(item_data.value from 4 for 2) from item where item_data.item_id = item.item_id and (item_data_type_id = 9 or item_data_type_id = 10) and upper(value) ~* '[0-9][0-9]/[0-9][0-9]/[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]';

changeSet.author: kkrumlian
changeSet.comment: Change date format for dataype date,pdate (MM/dd/YYYY) to ISO-8601
changeSet.sql: update ITEM_DATA set value = ( select SUBSTR(idx.value,7,4) || '-' || SUBSTR(idx.value,1,2) || '-' || SUBSTR(idx.value,4,2) from item_data idx,item i,item_data_type idt where idx.item_id = i.item_id and idx.item_data_id = ITEM_DATA.item_data_id and i.item_data_type_id = idt.item_data_type_id and (idt.item_data_type_id = 9 or idt.item_data_type_id = 10) ) where REGEXP_LIKE(UPPER(value),'^[0-9]{2}/[0-9]{2}/[0-9]{4}') and item_data_id = ( select idx.item_data_id from item_data idx,item i,item_data_type idt where idx.item_id = i.item_id and idx.item_data_id = ITEM_DATA.item_data_id and i.item_data_type_id = idt.item_data_type_id and (idt.item_data_type_id = 9 or idt.item_data_type_id = 10) );
